QuestData.Title: Mann's Man
QuestData.Description: <For once, the foreman lowers her voice.>$B$BLook, this ain't easy... I got another favor to ask. My idiot husband, Hao, is a shift lead down at the quarry. I told him not to go back, that it was too dangerous, but he's as stubborn as a hozen and twice as stupid. Says the boys need him around for "moral support."$B$B<Mann sneers.>$B$BWhat about my moral support?! What am I gonna do if that idiot dies?!$B$BPlease... keep an eye out for him. Tell him to come home.$B$B<Her eyes soften before she turns away.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Hao Mann at the Greenstone Quarry.
QuestData.RewardText: <Hao looks up at you, struggling to pull himself from the rubble.>$B$BNo, no. I got it. HNNGHHH!!$B$BOkay, maybe I don't got it.
